step_feedback.feedback: Good job placing hands on your abdomen. Try to keep your shoulders and elbows a bit more stable during this step.
Your hand placement is good. Focus on keeping your wrists and elbows more still as you sit or stand comfortably.
You're doing well with the breathing. Try to keep your wrists and elbows a little steadier while you tighten your body muscles and visualize the fluid movement.
Good effort on the exhale. Aim for more stability in your wrists and elbows as you relax your muscles and visualize pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with deep breathing to help your lymphatic system! Remember to keep your body still and focus on smooth breaths. This helps move fluid and promotes healing.
